problem_text_cn: 如图,在学习了轴对称后,小明在课外研究三角板时发现"两块完全相同的含有30°的三角板可以拼成一个等边三角形",请你帮他解决以下问题:在直角△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,∠A=30°,AC=6,BC≈3.5,点E、P分别在斜边AB和直角边AC上,则EP+BP的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, after learning about axis symmetry, Xiaoming found out that "two identical triangular plates containing N_0 can be assembled into an equilateral triangle" when studying the triangular plates outside of class. Please help him solve the following problems: In the right triangle △ABC, ∠ACB = N_1, ∠A = N_2, AC = N_3, BC≈N_4, points E and P are on the hypotenuse AB and the leg AC respectively, then the minimum value of EP + BP is ()
raw_answer: 解:作点B关于AC的对称点B′,过B′作B′E⊥AB交AC于点P,则EP+BP的最小值为B′E；∵∠A=30°,AC=6,BC≈3.5,∴AB≈7,sin∠B=\frac{AC}{AB}≈\frac{6}{7},∵∠B=60°,BB′≈7,∴sin∠B=\frac{EB^{′}}{BB^{′}}≈\frac{6}{7},∴EB′=6,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查最短路径问题；利用轴对称将EP+BP的最小值转化为垂线段长是解题的关键
